info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 05 at 8:40PM CST until March 05 at 8:45PM CST by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN ROCK ISLAND...WESTERN MERCER...SOUTHEASTERN LOUISA AND EAST CENTRAL MUSCATINE COUNTIES... At 839 PM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Montpelier to Mannon, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Wapello, New Boston, Keithsburg, Eliza, Oakville, Illinois City, Fairport, Toolesboro, Mannon, Elrick Junction, New Era, Fairport Recreation Area, Wildcat Den State Park, Shady Creek Campground, Petersville, Snively Access Campground, Flaming Prairie Park and Sweetland Center. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 PM CST for northwestern and west central Illinois...and southeastern and east central Iowa. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building.
